issue.title: Files no longer added to list after file access problem

content.raw:
OK, yes this is because things are decoupled in lyse - stuff arrives and is put in a queue, and success reported to BLACS. Another thread in lyse then reads the file. This latter thread is obviously crashing upon failure, and then does not read subsequent files. 

I can change this around so that the file is read before success is reported to BLACS. Also obviously it needs to be wrapped in a try: except: so that failure doesn't take down the thread in question.
